# conver 1 or 0
y = [1 if i=="B" else 0 for i in data.diagnosis]

y = np.asarray(y)
source.beb52478:

x = data.drop(["diagnosis"], axis=1)
source.96ea0356:

source.b1c3bcf2:

log_reg = LogisticRegression()
log_reg.fit(x_train, y_train)
source.aaa8c941:
